State.Author: fadingsignal
State.Description: Campsite is a simple, lightweight camping mod that adds craftable / carryable tents, sleeping bags (new HD textures!), dog beds, fires, lanterns, and cooking pot, each with their own unique dynamics, sounds, interactivity.  Simple enough for light play, detailed enough to make you feel involved. VR-friendly.
State.Name: Campsite - Simple Wasteland Camping (and HD Sleeping Bags)

State.Author: Titaa

A Dark & eerie music, menu cinematic, and UI FX overhaul.

Lots of samples showcases in the video tabs

Best played with Frost/Horizon and any weather + enb that'll make the game depressing
State.Name: COTC - A Dark and Eerie Menu Cinematic and Music Soundtrack Overhaul

State.Description:
A Dark & eerie music, menu cinematic, and UI FX overhaul.

Lots of samples showcases in the video tabs

State.Description: Squeaks, buzzes, rumbles... Adds over 40 hand placed sounds to Diamond City
State.Name: Diamond City Ambience

State.Author: AKcelsior and crazyjackal
State.Description: Sick of molerats and bloatflys triggering epic combat music? So are we.
State.Name: Dynamic Music Overhaul

State.Author: Macabre Productions
State.Description: The File-of-the-Month winning mod from Fallout 3 reaches the Commonwealth!  A full stand-alone radio station featuring hours of original music & hours of DJ talk and banter with a fully written 'fleshed-out' robot DJ!
State.Name: Existence 2.0

State.Author: reg2k and Neanka
State.Description: The Extended Dialogue Interface removes the hardcoded 4-option limit on dialogue and adds full engine support for any number of player dialogue options.
State.Name: Extended Dialogue Interface

State.Author: Team FOLON
State.Description:
This is a standalone weapon mod is that will also be featured in the upcoming Fallout: London mod.

It contains a Bren Gun with various workbench attachments to make different versions to better suit the users need.

Custom animations which are different for both 1st/3rd Person and Power Armour.
State.Name: Fallout London - Bren Gun

State.Author: SickStyle
State.Description: You won't know you really need this mod, until you install it. This mod overhauls all windows across the Commonwealth. RTX-ish next-gen reflections!
State.Name: Fallout 4 Ultimate Window Overhaul

State.Author: Cooler Balin and FO Miami
State.Description: A standalone Fire Axe melee weapon, that can also start fires.
State.Name: Fire Axe - A Standalone Melee Weapon

State.Author: reg2k
State.Description: Adds a photo mode to Fallout 4, accessible from the Pause menu or via hotkey.
State.Name: FO4 Photo Mode

State.Author: jefw
State.Description: Freeze is an overhaul of the entire intimidation perk including your intimidation chance and what you can do with surrendering opponents. Now with handcuffs!
State.Name: Freeze Intimidation Overhaul

State.Author: krrptd
State.Description: Ferals are ugly mofos, but still I prefer to see their faces instead of that void with floating hair. Heads of dead feral ghouls are now returned to their respective owners. No more bugged dead actors.
State.Name: FROST - Headless Dead Ferals Fix

State.Author: undernier
State.Description: Updates 30+ locations so they look like humans could actually survive in them.
State.Name: FROST - Hunkered Down - Commonwealth Overhaul

State.Author: undernier
State.Description: Updates 30+ locations so they look like humans could actually survive in them.

State.Author: NarcolepsyNick
State.Description: A patch for DeadPool2099's Hunting Shotgun and Frost.
State.Name: FROST - Hunting Shotgun Patch

State.Author: undernier
State.Description: "It snowed! I love snow; it makes everything beautiful. Not like that horrible black rain; It took half my hair last time; half of what was left anyway; It's more like scabs now. I hate the rain! ... and people too! Especially those cultists cannibals up north; they took my arm last month; but I'll get them. I hope it snows more soon." - Survivor.
State.Name: FROST - It Snowed - Winter Textures

State.Author: ResGestaeIV
State.Description: Vehicles are now Lootable to your heart's content in the Commonwealth and DLC areas based on Luck.

FROST - Nuka World is a patch that adds Nuka-World to Naugrim04's FROST Survival Simulator.

State.Author: Argonn - Alison
State.Description: Killing NPCs in FROST no longer result in a universal 2 sanity loss. Because you shouldn't feel as guilty killing a mad cannibalistic cultist compared to another guy that just wants to survive in the wasteland.

State.Author: Redawt alias RedMetal Shield
State.Description: This mod continues the development of the FROST Survival Simulator from Naugrim04, with bug fixes, removal of oversights, balancing, and the addition of new things (Hallucinations system, journals, items,...).

State.Description: The mod is designed exclusively for FROST in order give it a second chance for it to be played with less bugs, more content and more immersion.

Adds a standalone M1 Garand to Fallout 4.



**PING**

State.Author: NWI - Noniac - Wardaddy - Ricoginger
State.Description: Tired of seeing the Vault Boy with that thompson thats missing in every fallout since FO2? I'm here to address that. Thompson M1928A1 variant, fully animated with plenty of attachments. Ported from the awesome Day of Infamy by New World Interactive, the studio behind their other more popular title Insurgency.

State.Description: Save, load, transfer, import and export all your MCM settings at once. Transfer settings between savegames, backup your favorite settings, or send your settings to another user!

State.Description: Complete Modlist and Load Order Guide for Best Fallout 4 Modding Experience. Extreme Fallout 4 Engine & Textures Mods Optimization.

State.Description: More lighting for the playing field!

State.Description: This mod adds a Mosin Nagant into Fallout 4. It features Custom animations and Sounds. Its also highly customizable.

State.Author: mm137
State.Description: Makes weapon sounds more realistic for player and NPCs. Improves and balances ambiance and reverb to be more realistic and lively.  Increases the diversity and dynamics of in-game sound.  Fixes numerous issues. Lightweight and compatible with all sound replacer mods.

State.Author: JM
State.Description: The files in this package make many glass, ceramic, and other things destructible!
State.Name: Shatter - Shardz and Spillz

State.Author: zorak912
State.Description: This mod adds new creepy and not-so-creepy sounds to the commonwealth atmosphere
State.Name: Sinister Ambient Sound

State.Author: falloutkid12
State.Description:
Aligns the exterior world lighting with the sun and moon and allows the game to cast shadows at shallower angles. Includes a script that automatically reduces shadow intensity at sunrise and sunset for a more realistic environment.



COMPATIBLE WITH ALL WEATHER MODS AND ENBs!

REQUIRES FAR HARBOR AND NUKA WORLD!

VERSION 2 REQUIRES
State.Name: Sunlight Alignment Tweak - Better Dawn and Dusk

State.Author: Zzyxzz
State.Description:
Features a brand new eat and drink system, which relies on weight of the item instead of the caps value and allows you to control it.

In addition to that, you can tweak many aspects of the survival added features. Like tweaking disease chance, disabling Adrenaline. Choose how long you can maximally sleep on the different bet types.

And mo
State.Name: Survival Configuration Menu

State.Author: L00
State.Description: A gore and blood overhaul for Fallout 4.
State.Name: True Blood

State.Author: gargorias
State.Description: This is a comprehensive lighting mod that brings you many more shadow lights and a general improvement to overall lighting, ambience and fog to the interiors of the Commonweatlh, Far Harbor and Nuka World.
State.Name: Ultra Interior Lighting

State.Author: Unofficial Patch Project Team
State.Description: A comprehensive bugfixing mod for Fallout 4. The goal of the Unofficial Fallout 4 Patch (aka UFO4P) is to eventually fix every bug with Fallout 4 not officially resolved by the developers to the limits of the Creation Kit and community-developed tools, in one easy-to-install package.
State.Name: Unofficial Fallout 4 Patch

State.Author: Ablaze666
State.Description: This small mod fixes the exaggerated shine of specific objects while it's raining.
State.Name: Wetness Shader Fix

State.Author: flecked
State.Description: Winter pine trees are all around the Commonwealth
State.Name: Winter Commonwealth Pines

State.Author: Hedied
State.Description: Adds actual gun shot reverbs which makes a big difference when shooting in interior.
State.Name: _Sound Zero_

State.Author: DoubleYou
State.Description: Bethesda's INI configuration files are a mess. BethINI optimizes the game for increased graphical fidelity and performance.
State.Name: BethINI

State.Author: ElminsterAU and the xEdit Team
State.Description: FO4Edit is the Fallout 4 version of xEdit. xEdit is an advanced graphical module viewer/editor and conflict detector.
State.Name: FO4Edit

State.Author: shavkacagarikia
State.Description: Finally, a proper engine-level system for bullet counted reloads with most of the features such a system should have.
State.Name: Bullet Counted Reload System (BCR)

State.Author: Kassent
State.Description: This is a F4SE plugin which makes console menu show extra useful infomation about selected target,for example, target's name, ID, baseID, mod name and so on.This plugin also add some extra info lists to console to show selected actor's all kinds of info like factions, perks, active effects, actor values, equipments and so on.
State.Name: Better Console - F4SE

State.Author: shavkacagarikia
State.Description: Finally, a proper engine-level system for bullet counted reloads with most of the features such a system should have.
State.Name: Bullet Counted Reload System (BCR)

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: A highly configurable HUD. Every widget can be positioned and configured. Configure your design in the in-game layout manager in MCM. Layouts can be shared and imported too.
State.Name: FallUI - HUD

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: This is FallUI - Inventory. A optimized Fallout 4 inventory interface for PC.
State.Name: FallUI - Inventory

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: Better workbench interface optimized for PC. Bigger display size. Data columns. Comparision columns for mods. Item icon tag support. Icon menu for choosing your icon tag. Item subtitles. Autobuilding modules with zero cost. All languages included.
State.Name: FallUI - Workbench

State.Author: Neanka
State.Description: new LevelUpMenu which also allow to add brand new perks into game, remove any classic perks and even add skills system into game
State.Name: LevelUpMenuEx

State.Author: reg2k - Neanka - shadowslasher410
State.Description: The Mod Configuration Menu is a settings page for mods! It provides a central location for mod configuration, accessible via the Pause menu.

State.Author: lStewieAl
State.Description: Simple F4SE plugin (dll) to delay XP popups till after combat.

State.Author: registrator2000
State.Description:
A F4SE plugin that allows you to disable the hardcoded, vision-obscuring shader effect at various workbenches so you can actually see what you're crafting.



Also allows you to change the shader effect for the Power Armor station and robot workbenches to a outline-only shader instead of a full shader.
State.Name: Crafting Highlight Fix

State.Author: ramccoid
State.Description: This retextures the sun to give a radiant effect.
State.Name: FO4 SUN

State.Author: Antonix35
State.Description:
Untie the game speed from the framerate. Fixes physical bugs. Reduces loading time.

Now there is a separate version for VR.
State.Name: High FPS Physics Fix

State.Author: AntoniX
State.Description:
Fixed twitching/stuttering when sprinting in first person.



Исправление дрожания камеры от первого лица при спринте.
State.Name: Sprint Stuttering Fix

State.Author: Kassent
State.Description: This is a F4SE plugin which restores some hard-coded features disabled by game in survival mode,for example,unlock console,enable TGM,enable fast travel,restore vanilla compass settings,enalbe quick save and auto save,etc .
State.Name: Unlimited Survival Mode - F4SE
